messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to The Glorious USSR. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We have split from the nanotrasen pigs, this is now communist controlled space, glory to the workers,  and to the ussr.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Nanotrasena re all capitalist pigs. oink oink.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard The Glorious USSR. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in The Glorious USSR's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to The Glorious USSR. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Checkpoint.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a whoop of energy draining parasites have swarmed into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

Massive be*pa#>e anomaly detected on all frequencies. All crew are directed to @!$, CH-ETR NYY HAGEHGUF <&. the anomalies and destroy their source to prevent further damage to corporate property. This is not a drill. Estimated time of appearance: 300 seconds. Use this time to prepare for an attack on The Glorious USSR.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We aren't jealous. Wanna prove it?
